title: Why would Lissandra need nerfs....?
body:
Such an odd choice for a champ that seems rarely played, and also rather balanced. 

That and doesn't need mana increases when she already has mana issues even with that, uh... great... passive (after mid game at least).

Well, she's been played quite a fair amount in LCS recently, and we all know how much priority Riot gives the LCS in terms of game balance. And to be fair, I've been playing a bunch of Liss in the past few days and she seems really frickin good if you know what you're doing. Protobelt is busted on her.
The most common build in LCS/LCK doesnt use a mana item, so the nerfs are probably because of that
